submitText.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

termsModal.title: Terms & Disclosures
termsModal.subtitle: Before submitting your story, please review and agree to the following:

copyright.title: 1. Copyright & Original Work
copyright.description: You confirm that this story is your original work and you own all copyright, or you have obtained necessary permissions from the copyright holder. You agree not to submit plagiarized or copyrighted content without proper authorization.

guidelines.title: 2. Content Guidelines
guidelines.description: Your story must be appropriate for children and free from violence, explicit content, hate speech, or discriminatory language. Content should align with our mission to provide educational and inspiring stories for young readers worldwide.

license.title: 3. License Agreement
license.description: By submitting, you grant 1001 Stories a license to publish, distribute, and display your story on our platform. You retain ownership of your work but allow us to make it available to students and teachers. You can choose your preferred license type after editorial review.

review.title: 4. Review Process
review.description: Your story will be reviewed by our editorial team within 3-5 business days. We may request revisions to improve clarity, age-appropriateness, or educational value. You will receive feedback via email and can make revisions through your dashboard.

checkboxes.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to all terms above
checkboxes.confirmOriginal: I confirm this is my original work

termsModal.error: Please confirm both checkboxes to continue

successModal.title: Story Submitted!
successModal.message: Your story has been successfully submitted for review.

nextSteps.feedback: You'll receive feedback or revision requests via email
nextSteps.track: Track your story's progress anytime from your dashboard

hero.title: Discover Stories from Around the World
hero.description: Explore authentic stories written by children from underserved communities across the globe. Every story you read supports educational opportunities through our Seeds of Empowerment program.

features.title: Powerful Features for Every Reader
features.subtitle: Discover tools designed to enhance learning and engagement with every story.

stories.title: 22+ Stories from 6 Countries
stories.description: Discover authentic stories from children in Tanzania, India, Mexico, Palestine, Rwanda, and Uganda.

languages.title: 12 Languages Available
languages.description: Access stories in multiple languages including English, Spanish, French, Arabic, Hindi, and more.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Learning Tools
aiPowered.description: Get instant word explanations, content summaries, and personalized reading assistance powered by advanced AI.

progressive.title: Progressive Reading Levels
progressive.description: Content automatically adapts to your reading proficiency with difficulty-adjusted text and vocabulary support.

interactive.title: Interactive Book Clubs
interactive.description: Join discussions, ask questions, and connect with other readers in collaborative learning environments.

kidLibrary.title: Kid Library
kidLibrary.description1: Kid Library is a global story collection where children can read and listen to stories written by kids from different cultures and backgrounds.
kidLibrary.description2: It's a space for creativity, learning, and imagination, designed to inspire young readers everywhere.

step1.title: Browse Stories

writingVolunteer.title: Writing Volunteer
writingVolunteer.description1: Write a story, make an impact. Through Writing Volunteer, students become young authors, sharing their own stories with the world.
writingVolunteer.description2: It's a chance to inspire others, build writing skills, and be part of a global storytelling community.

englishLearning.title: English Learning Programs
englishLearning.description1: Learn English through stories that inspire. Our learning programs use real stories to help students build vocabulary, improve reading, and grow their English skills.
englishLearning.description2: It's fun, engaging, and designed for every learner.

cta.title: Join Our Global Community
cta.description: Start discovering, creating, and sharing stories today

footer.tagline: Empowering young voices, inspiring the world through stories.

hero.title: 1001 Stories,
hero.subtitle: Empowering Communities through Storytelling
hero.description: A global citizenship platform for young learners, bringing stories from under-resourced communities to the world

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: Seeds of Empowerment and the 1001 Stories Project

soe.title: Seeds of Empowerment
soe.description: SOE is a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering underserved communities through education, storytelling, and technology. By supporting grassroots projects around the world, they help amplify local voices and foster sustainable development.

stories.title: 1001 Stories Project
stories.description: Our mobile storytelling program, 1001 Stories, brings meaningful learning to some of the hardest to reach populations around the world. We aim to facilitate the creation, development, and gathering of 1001 empowering stories from every participating local community.

benefit1.title: Promote Global Citizenship and Literacy
benefit1.description: Through storytelling and cultural exchange, 1001 Stories fosters global citizenship education, helping children around the world develop reading and writing skills. By publishing and sharing their stories on a global stage, we amplify young voices and inspire cross-cultural understanding.

benefit2.title: Empower Young Learners Everywhere
benefit2.description: We raise awareness about diverse experiences and support children's dreams by offering scholarships and creating accessible educational opportunities. Our self-sustaining platform is designed to empower all young learners, regardless of their backgrounds, to thrive and grow.

benefit3.title: Integrate AI and Personalized Learning
benefit3.description: By combining storybooks with AI-powered tools, 1001 Stories offers personalized learning experiences tailored to each student's journey. Our platform nurtures creativity, builds practical AI literacy skills, and prepares young minds for an increasingly connected and digital future.

features.title: Our Features
features.subtitle: More exciting features are on the way. Stay tuned!

library.title: Browse the 1001 Stories Library
library.description: Discover stories written by young authors around the world. Explore different cultures, perspectives, and dreams through storytelling.

write.title: Write Your Story
write.description: Share your voice with the world! Write and submit your own story, inspire others, and become part of our global library.

bookclub.title: Join a Book Club (Coming Soon)
bookclub.description: Find and join book clubs that match your interests. Read together, discuss ideas, and connect with young storytellers across the globe.

goals.title: Set and Track Your Goals (Coming Soon)
goals.description: Start with a quick assessment to personalize your journey. Set learning goals based on your interests and track your progress as you grow.

sofia.quote: Before 1001 Stories, I was too shy to share my writing. Now, my story is published for everyone to read! I feel like my voice matters, and I want to write even more

ayaan.quote: I love reading stories from kids in other countries. It feels like I'm making new friends from around the world. 1001 Stories makes learning so much fun!

emily.quote: 1001 Stories gave my daughter the confidence to express herself creatively. Watching her set goals, complete her first story, and proudly share it was an unforgettable moment for our family

david.quote: As a parent, I wanted something educational but also inspiring. 1001 Stories struck the perfect balance‚Äîhelping my son develop literacy skills while encouraging him to think globally and dream big.

footer.tagline: Empowering young voices and inspiring the world through stories.

firstStory.name: First Story
firstStory.description: Submit your first story to the platform

missionVision.tagline1: Where Every Smile Has a Story :
missionVision.tagline2: Where Stories Become Learning, and Learning Becomes Stories.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Our mobile storytelling program, 1001 Stories, brings meaningful learning to some of the hardest to reach populations around the world. We aim to facilitate the creation, development, and gathering of 1001 empowering stories from every participating local community.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description: We believe every child carries the spark of an Einstein. Books inspire learning, and learning awakens potential. Our vision is a world where every child has access to education ‚Äî a place where imagination can grow without limits.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using 1001 Stories. By accessing our platform, you agree to these terms.

canDo.title: What you can do
canDo.item1: Read and enjoy stories from around the world
canDo.item2: Submit your original stories for publication
canDo.item4: Use our educational tools and AI assistants

cannotDo.title: What you cannot do
cannotDo.item1: Copy or redistribute content without permission
cannotDo.item2: Submit content that belongs to others
cannotDo.item3: Use the platform for commercial purposes

section1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
section1.agreement: By accessing or using 1001 Stories, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this platform.
section1.minorsWarning: If you are under 13 years old, you must have parental or guardian consent to use this platform. Parents and guardians are responsible for monitoring their children's use of the platform.

section2.title: 2. Description of Service
section2.intro: 1001 Stories is an educational platform that provides:
section2.purpose1: A digital library of children's stories from diverse cultures
section2.purpose2: Tools for reading, learning, and story discovery
section2.operator: The platform is operated by Seeds of Empowerment, a non-profit organization dedicated to global education.

educationalRoles.title: Educational Roles
educationalRoles.students: Learners: Access assigned books and learning tools
educationalRoles.teachers: Teachers: Create classes and assign books to students
educationalRoles.institutions: Institutions: Manage multiple teachers and classes

contentRoles.title: Content Roles
contentRoles.writers: Writers: Submit and track story submissions

accountSecurity.title: Account Security
accountSecurity.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized access to your account.

acceptableContent.title: Acceptable Content
acceptableContent.item1: Original stories written by you or with proper permissions
acceptableContent.item4: Content that promotes positive values and diversity

prohibitedContent.title: Prohibited Content
prohibitedContent.item1: Content that infringes on copyrights or trademarks
prohibitedContent.item5: Personal information about minors without consent

yourContent.title: Your Content
yourContent.intro: When you submit content to 1001 Stories, you grant us a non-exclusive license to:
yourContent.license1: Publish and display your content on our platform
yourContent.license2: Edit and format content for publication
yourContent.license3: Use content for educational and promotional purposes

ourContent.title: Our Content
ourContent.description: The platform, its design, features, and original content are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

permittedUses.title: Permitted Uses
permittedUses.item1: Teachers may use content for classroom instruction
permittedUses.item2: Students may access assigned materials for learning
permittedUses.item3: Parents may read stories with their children
permittedUses.item4: Institutions may integrate content into curricula
permittedUses.attribution: All educational use must include proper attribution to 1001 Stories and the original authors.

section7.title: 7. Privacy and Data
section7.intro: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our
section7.coppaCompliance: We comply with COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) and do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental consent.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
section8.intro: 1001 Stories is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:
section8.limitation3: Compatibility with all devices or browsers
section8.disclaimer: We strive to provide the best possible service, but cannot be held liable for technical issues or content accuracy.

section9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
section9.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law, 1001 Stories and its operators shall not be liable for:
section9.liability4: Actions of third parties or other users

section10.title: 10. Termination
section10.intro: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time:
section10.you: You may delete your account through the settings page
section10.us: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms
section10.afterTermination: Upon termination, your content may be retained for educational purposes as outlined in our content license.

section11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
section11.intro: We may update these terms periodically. Changes may be made for reasons including:
section11.notification: Significant changes will be communicated via email or platform notification. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

section12.title: 12. Contact Information
section12.intro: For questions about these terms or our services, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Your data is encrypted and protected

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.description: We're clear about what we collect and why

control.title: Your Control
control.description: You can access, modify, or delete your data

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.item1: Name and email address for account creation
personalInfo.item2: Profile information you choose to provide

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.item1: Provide and improve our educational services
section2.item4: Ensure platform security and prevent abuse

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing

noSell.title: We Never Sell Your Data
noSell.description: 1001 Stories is a non-profit educational platform. We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

section3.intro: We may share information only in these limited circumstances:
section3.item1: With teachers for students in their classes (educational data only)
section3.item2: With service providers who help us operate the platform
section3.item3: When required by law or legal process
section3.item4: To protect the safety of our users

section4.title: 4. Children's Privacy
section4.intro: We are especially committed to protecting children's privacy. For users under 13:
section4.item1: We require parental consent before collecting personal information
section4.item2: Parents can review and delete their child's information
section4.item3: We limit data collection to what's necessary for education
section4.item4: We do not target advertising to children
section4.item5: Teachers and parents can manage student accounts

technicalMeasures.title: Technical Measures
technicalMeasures.item1: ‚Ä¢ SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.item8: Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.intro: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact our Privacy Team:

section8.title: 8. Updates to This Policy
section8.intro: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. When we make changes:
section8.item1: We will update the "Last Updated" date at the top
section8.item2: For significant changes, we will notify you by email
section8.item3: We will provide a summary of key changes
section8.item4: Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include session management, authentication, and security features.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.
